author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

Hello, 

Thanks for the feedback, done on my side !
@+R

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/RGerzaguet/DigitalComm.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
